fields.Title: DOOMED / ICE BEAR FRIDGE
fields.Description:
1. Has a note inside that points to the frozen ice cream maker that has the filament memory stored inside.
2. Reacting to the fact that there's a giant ice bear fridge still running them a loss.
3. This is where you put the hanged man. If hub reached then this is an instant solution for TASK.find_fridge / If has TASK.find_fridge then this is the solution.
4. The fridge can be turned off from the breaker box.

fields.Title: START
input
Shivers: "As she makes her way to the market..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As she makes her way to the market stall the girl starts crying: a ferocious ice bear is guarding the fridge! Its paws raised to ward off any potential customers.

fields.Title: You: ""Hey, I can't see the off-site copy..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey, I can't see the off-site copy anywhere..." (Check the shelves again.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He studies the fridge. "It's certai..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He studies the fridge. "It's certainly an eccentric choice, but it *is* big enough. And cold enough, too..."

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "You've *definitely* earned a drink..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You've *definitely* earned a drink after this. Perhaps even some *pagan rites*.

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, Kim. Take him away." (The li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, Kim. Take him away." (The lieutenant takes the body away -- work alone for the rest of the day.)

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Beautiful," he says, wiping his ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Beautiful," he says, wiping his hands in his handkerchief. "A dead body in an ice bear fridge -- this is some of the best police work I've ever done."

fields.Title: You: ""Really? You think it's good work?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Really? You think it's good work?"

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah, I'm not *proud* either, but..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, I'm not *proud* either, but we did find a fridge."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Shall we go and get the body, then..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Shall we go and get the body, then? I'll take the head, you take the feet. The stairs won't be easy, but we'll manage."

fields.Title: Variable["doomed.breakerbox_red_wire_plugged_out"]
Variable["doomed.breakerbox_red_wire_plugged_out"]
!(Variable["doomed.breakerbox_red_wire_plugged_out"])

!(Variable["doomed.breakerbox_red_wire_plugged_out"])
Jump to: [ICE BEAR FRIDGE MAIN HUB]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's take a look inside.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's take a look inside."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "... but the optics on this are awfu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ... but the optics on this are awful, he thinks. We need to be as silent as we can.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "You have created an *ice bear sarco..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You have created an *ice bear sarcophagus*.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "He's right. His work would be much..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's right. His work would be much more formal.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""At least we've stopped the body fr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "At least we've stopped the body from decomposing further. Now you can conduct another inspection. Under controlled *circumstances*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course. Just a giant, ice bear..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course. Just a giant, ice bear shaped fridge..." He relaxes his hand, his face bathed in the harsh light of the open fridge door.

fields.Title: You: "Look inside the refrigerator."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look inside the refrigerator.

fields.Title: Perception (Smell): "The paper still smells of vanilla a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The paper still smells of vanilla and chocolate.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Your visual confirms: you could fit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your visual confirms: you could fit *two* more bodies in the ice bear fridge.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "The two of you? Easily."
fields.Dialogue Text: The two of you? Easily.

fields.Title: Jump to: [XP.discover_the_bullet]
Reaction Speed: "This must be the giant ice bear fri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This must be the giant ice bear fridge that Soona mentioned. Look inside.

fields.Dialogue Text: "I think this is a glorious achievement and people need to hear about it."

Jump to: [ICE BEAR FRIDGE MAIN HUB]
You: "Try to remove the dead man's boots..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Try to remove the dead man's boots again.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["doomed.fridge_corpse_in_fridge"]  and  Variable["TASK.send_corpse_to_processing_done"] == false  and  Variable["yard.hanged_boots_removed"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.get_the_boots_off_the_hanged_mans_feet"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.get_the_boots_off_the_hanged_mans_feet_done"] == false  and  (Variable["yard.hanged_tried_removing_boots"] == true  or  Variable["yard.hanged_tried_to_remove_boots_once"] == true)

fields.Title: You: ""Behold! We have created an *ice be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Behold! We have created an *ice bear sarcophagus*."

fields.Title: Half Light: "This ice bear is a hypercarnivore...."
fields.Dialogue Text: This ice bear is a hypercarnivore. Be careful.

fields.Title: Ice Bear Fridge: "A gust of freezing cold air rushes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A gust of freezing cold air rushes to greet you. You hear a low grumble, as the bear regulates itself... This is the inside of a refrigerator.

fields.Title: You: "Close the door. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Close the door. [Leave.]

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course you don't. Look at that!..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course you don't. Look at that! What have we *done?* We stuffed a dead body in an ice bear fridge. This does *not* leave this room."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant doesn't answer, his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant doesn't answer, his eyes glued to the animal. It's dark inside its mysterious belly-compartment...

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "The bear looks oddly realistic. Is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The bear looks oddly realistic. Is it taxidermy?

fields.Title: Shivers: "Her mother rushes to soothe her, bu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Her mother rushes to soothe her, but Fifette doesn't want ice cream anymore, she just wants to go home. The ice bear stares at them as they leave the plaza. A gust of wind flies one of the wrappers right past the sobbing girl...

fields.Title: Ice Bear Fridge: "It's perfect -- big, with a powerfu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's perfect -- big, with a powerful cooling system. Now if you could just plug in the fridge and get the lieutenant to help you...

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. We need to celebrate by perfo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. We need to celebrate by performing pagan rites. Let's bring out the mead and set it on fire."

fields.Dialogue Text: "I know," says the lieutenant, "what an unfortunate marketing choice."

fields.Dialogue Text: Hm, the fridge looks big enough for the corpse...

fields.Title: Jump to: [yard.hanged_inland_corpse_answered]
You: ""What *is* this thing? It looks lik..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What *is* this thing? It looks like a giant ice bear..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What is even worse -- the bear is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is even worse -- the bear is still costing them money, to this day..." The lieutenant points at the red snaky cable running from the fridge.

fields.Title: Half Light: "Its eyes are dead, but it's still t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Its eyes are dead, but it's still terrifying... Run before it wakes up!

Ice Bear Fridge: "A faint waft of cool air rolls out...."
fields.Dialogue Text: A faint waft of cool air rolls out. You hear the sound of dripping water. This is the inside of a defrosting refrigerator.

fields.Title: Variable["doomed.breakerbox_red_wire_plugged_out"]
Variable["doomed.breakerbox_red_wire_plugged_out"]
!(Variable["doomed.breakerbox_red_wire_plugged_out"])
The Hanged Man: "The body is heavier than you expect..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The body is heavier than you expected -- and stinkier. It takes half an hour to get it down to the basement, then ten more minutes to stuff it into the fridge. The lieutenant takes a step back to admire your handiwork.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Just what we were looking for -- l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just what we were looking for -- let's see what's inside."

fields.Title: Jump to: [ICE BEAR FRIDGE MAIN HUB]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's certainly an... eccentric cho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's certainly an... eccentric choice. But it is capacious -- and cold enough, too..."

Variable["doomed.breakerbox_red_wire_plugged_out"]
!(Variable["doomed.breakerbox_red_wire_plugged_out"])

Ice Bear Fridge: "The fridge buzzes with energy. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The fridge buzzes with energy. The electricity bill on this thing must be *catastrophic*.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. Not really. Look at that! What..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. Not really. Look at that! What have we done? We stuffed a *dead body in an ice bear fridge*. This story does not leave this room."

fields.Title: You: "Examine one of the ice cream wrappe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Examine one of the ice cream wrappers in there.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good question. It looks like an ic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good question. It looks like an ice cream fridge." The lieutenant reaches for one of the wrappers. He studies it in the light.

fields.Title: Jump to: [ICE BEAR FRIDGE MAIN HUB]
Ice Bear Fridge: "You see a terrifying ice bear with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You see a terrifying ice bear with a strange compartment in its belly. The door is covered in frost and the bear's eyes are glowing red.

Ice Bear Fridge: "The bear's eyes are dead and empty,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The bear's eyes are dead and empty, the corpse inside the fridge slowly rotting... The power has been cut off.

fields.Title: You: ""The fridge is plugged in now. Will..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The fridge is plugged in now. Will you help me with the body, Kim?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [ICE BEAR FRIDGE MAIN HUB]
You: ""Alright, time to freeze the body!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Alright, time to freeze the body!"

fields.Title: Jump to: [ICE BEAR FRIDGE MAIN HUB]
You: "Back off. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Back off. [Leave.]

fields.Title: Ice Bear Fridge: "Your words echo in the empty chambe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your words echo in the empty chamber, ringing against the wet floor tiles. The bear keeps staring. A sharp slice of light shines out from its mysterious belly-door.

fields.Title: Variable["doomed.breakerbox_red_wire_plugged_out"]
Variable["doomed.breakerbox_red_wire_plugged_out"]
!(Variable["doomed.breakerbox_red_wire_plugged_out"])
Ice Bear Fridge: "The bear's eyes are still glowing r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The bear's eyes are still glowing red, watching over all the ice cream wrappers hidden inside its belly.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course. I'll take the head, you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course. I'll take the head, you take the feet..."

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "Inside the icy realm of the ice bea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Inside the icy realm of the ice bear fridge, the corpse stands slumped, waiting...

fields.Title: You: ""Tell me, who are you, dead man?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tell me, who are you, dead man?"
fields.tooltip1: Talked to him in your dream.

Shivers: "Somewhere in the past it's summer...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Somewhere in the past it's summer. Five-year-old Fifette lets go of her mother's hand, change jingling in her pockets, as she hops towards the ice cream stand right across the plaza.

fields.Title: Ice Bear Fridge: "It's perfect -- big, with a powerfu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's perfect -- big, with a powerful cooling system. Now if you could just get the lieutenant to help you with the body...

fields.Title: Jump to: [You: "Look inside the refrigerator."]
Perception (Smell): "The paper still smells of vanilla a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The paper still smells of vanilla and chocolate. Even under this stench you can feel it.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The electricity bill must be *cata..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The electricity bill must be *catastrophic*. On the other hand, it did help us with a certain corpse situation..."

fields.Title: You: ""So what do you think of this fridg..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So what do you think of this fridge, Kim? It looks big enough for *two* corpses."

fields.Title: You: "Search the body *one more time*, th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Search the body *one more time*, thoroughly.
fields.tooltip2: Need reason to pull head off.
fields.tooltip6: Felt a little bump on the head.
fields.tooltip9: Two officers must be present to conduct a field autopsy.
fields.tooltip10: Knows there's a bullet in there.

Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not going to be the *easiest*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not going to be the *easiest* thing in the world, but we'll manage."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant studies the fridge...."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant studies the fridge. "It's an eccentric choice... but it definitely fits the body. Now the only thing left to do is plug the fridge back in."

fields.Title: Jump to: [yard.hanged_perception_white_oval_wound]
The Hanged Man: "Shoot, Loonie Roonie!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Shoot, Loonie Roonie!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. They do *not* -- they *need* t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. They do *not* -- they *need* to hear about our uneventful, boring, downright *conservative* murder investigation."
fields.Alternate1: "I hope not." He throws an exasperated look at your feet and purses his lips.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Someone must have taken it... What..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Someone must have taken it... What does the note say?"

fields.Dialogue Text: "Hold on..." The lieutenant inspects the dark interior of the refrigerator. "There's no use if the fridge isn't working. Let's plug it in first and then return here to move the body."

fields.Title: You: "Crack open the door..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Crack open the door...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant takes a peek inside...."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant takes a peek inside. His hand has found the holster of his gun.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If I were an artist, this would ce..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If I were an artist, this would certainly *not* be my vision. I would be much, much more conservative in my work..."
fields.Alternate1: He throws a look at your feet. "And I'm guessing grave-robbery is also part of the performance?"

fields.Title: You: ""Kim, this fridge looks perfect for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim, this fridge looks perfect for the corpse -- we don't have to ask around anymore."

fields.Title: You: "This looks like it could easily fit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This looks like it could easily fit the corpse inside.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "But where's the filament memory? It..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But where's the filament memory? It's not here...

fields.Title: Ice Bear Fridge: "The bear's eyes are still glowing r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The bear's eyes are still glowing red -- it's guarding over the freezing corpse hidden inside its belly.

fields.Title: You: ""This is clearly *the* fridge. It l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is clearly *the* fridge. It looks big enough for *two* corpses."

fields.Title: Ice Bear Fridge: "It's perfect -- big, with a powerfu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's perfect -- big, with a powerful cooling system. Now if you could just get the lieutenant to help you with the body...

Jump to: [IsKimHere()]
Ice Bear Fridge: "The shelves are empty. All you see..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The shelves are empty. All you see are crumpled ice cream wrappers with the brand name *Revachol Ice City*. A handwritten note has been attached to the door. The fridge is huge.

fields.Title: sold hub
Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's certainly an... eccentric cho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's certainly an... eccentric choice. But it's more than big enough -- and cold enough. Honestly, it's perfect. All we have to do is plug the fridge back in."

fields.Title: Ice Bear Fridge: "It's perfect -- big, with a powerfu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's perfect -- big, with a powerful cooling system. Now if you could just plug in the fridge and get the lieutenant to help you...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course. A giant, ice bear shape..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course. A giant, ice bear shaped fridge..." He relaxes his hand, his face bathed in the harsh light of the open fridge door.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I *knew* you would say that! I *kn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I *knew* you would say that! I *knew* this would lead to drinking..." He shakes his head vigorously. "No. No more. This is *paganistic* enough -- and it does *not* leave this room."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Indeed. Refrigerated meat is much b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Indeed. Refrigerated meat is much better for coroner's work.

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
You: ""What is a giant bear-shaped fridge..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is a giant bear-shaped fridge doing in an abandoned cellar in the first place?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [ICE BEAR FRIDGE MAIN HUB]
Ice Bear Fridge: "The bear's eyes are dead and empty,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The bear's eyes are dead and empty, ice inside the fridge slowly melting... The power has been cut off.

fields.Title: Ice Bear Fridge: "A friendly cartoon bear smiles back..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A friendly cartoon bear smiles back at you from a glossy cellophane wrapper. It looks nothing like the fridge.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good question. It looks like an ic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good question. It looks like an ice cream fridge." The lieutenant reaches for one of the wrappers. He tries to study it in the darkness.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course. I'll take the head, you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course. I'll take the head, you take the feet..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Did we, though?" He sighs. "Okay,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did we, though?" He sighs. "Okay, maybe we *did*"
fields.Alternate1: "Did we, though?" He throws an exasperated look at your feet and purses his lips.

fields.Title: Ice Bear Fridge: "Your words echo in the empty chambe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your words echo in the empty chamber, ringing against the wet floor tiles... It's dark inside the bear's mysterious belly-compartment...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""At least it's not running them a l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "At least it's not running them a loss anymore, now that you've un-plugged the cable." He points at the red snaky cable running from the fridge.

fields.Title: You: ""Bag him. Take him away, Kim." (Let..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Bag him. Take him away, Kim." (Let the lieutenant take the body away without further examination.)
fields.Alternate1: "Let's bag him, Kim. Take him away." (The lieutenant takes the body away -- you work alone for the rest of the day.)
fields.Alternate2: "Let's drag him to the Kineema." (You're finished with the corpse.)

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["doomed.fridge_corpse_in_fridge"]  and  Variable["TASK.send_corpse_to_processing_done"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.perform_field_autopsy_done"] == true  and  IsKimHere()  and  Variable["yard.corpse_special_stalled_exit"] == false

fields.Title: Jump to: [le corpse questionnaire]
ICE BEAR FRIDGE MAIN HUB
You: "Take the note from the door."
fields.Dialogue Text: Take the note from the door.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "This must be the fridge you were to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This must be the fridge you were told about. Look inside, see if it's big enough for the corpse.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not sure I believe you.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not sure I believe you."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""As impressive as the fridge is, th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "As impressive as the fridge is, this is a *small* victory. Among numerous defeats."
fields.Alternate1: "As impressive as the fridge itself is, this is a rather small victory." He throws an exasperated look at your feet. "Among many defeats."

fields.Title: Authority: "He means it. He doesn't want to be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He means it. He doesn't want to be the Ice Bear Cop.

fields.Title: Ice Bear Fridge: "The fridge sits empty before you, a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The fridge sits empty before you, an overindulgent wardrobe now that the cooling systems aren't active.

Tutorial Agent: "You've acquired an interactable ite..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You've acquired an interactable item. Investigate this item further by going to the INTERACT tab in your INVENTORY.

fields.Title: Ice Bear Fridge: "You see the looming shadow of an ic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You see the looming shadow of an ice bear with a strange compartment in its belly. The door is slightly open...

fields.Title: Variable["doomed.breakerbox_red_wire_plugged_out"]
Variable["doomed.breakerbox_red_wire_plugged_out"]
!(Variable["doomed.breakerbox_red_wire_plugged_out"])
Ice Bear Fridge: "A friendly cartoon bear smiles back..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A friendly cartoon bear smiles back at you from a glossy cellophane wrapper. It looks nothing like the fridge -- or the decomposing body in it.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""At least we've stopped the body fr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "At least we've stopped the body from decomposing further -- or will have, once you plug the fridge back in. Then you can conduct one more inspection."

fields.Title: Ice Bear Fridge: "You pocket the note -- *and* the li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You pocket the note -- *and* the little fridge magnets keeping it on the door.

fields.Title: Jump to: [ICE BEAR FRIDGE MAIN HUB]
You: ""So they tried to sell ice cream fr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So they tried to sell ice cream from this hypercarnivore?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods gravely. "Talk of the *ice..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He nods gravely. "Talk of the *ice bear sarcophagus* must *not* leave this room."

fields.Dialogue Text: Tell me something, dead man.

fields.Dialogue Text: "We did our best with the means at our disposal."
